author: John Gardner
comment: Great app until recently is now mixing up north and south bound services (at Pearse Street confirmed - Hazelhatch trains).  And months later not fixed.  Guess it's not a key project anymore and that's a pity because otherwise it could be superior to company app.

author: Gerome van Jaarsveld
comment: The app doesn't work on my android watch anymore. I updated it to the latest version and it's frozen at the first page trying to load up

author: Peter Tumulty
comment: App crashes when I try to use the timetable feature.

author: Julian Perez Alzueta
comment: Good app but feel precious version was better. The refresh doesn't work automatically and the tiles become often misleading (this happens especially when and add wants to pop in). Also, like today, it shows no trains were found when trains were actually working as normal so sometimes unreliable.

author: Juzer Banat
comment: Brilliant app,  just app doesn't work on Sony smart watch 3.
title: Smart watch app doesn't work

author: Isaac Elebert
comment: Use it in a daily basis and have never experienced a single problem, Props to the Developers!
title: Great

author: Brian Butler
comment: Arrived at the station too many times to see the app was way off.
title: Gives the wrong times

author: Tony Fannin
comment: Wants you to say for upgrade  Don't download this crap

author: BLAITHIN S
comment: Doesn't include parkwest cherry orchard station

author: Pete Mc Nally
comment: It's a great job!
title: Great

author: Ruben Gasparyan
comment: Would you please also show if trains are delayed? Hate running to a train station to realise there are 10 more minutes till my train arrives.
title: Nice app

author: Kaiser Sose
comment: Has given me incorrect timetable info several times
title: Incorrect timetable info

comment: Even includes train fair now, genius :)
title: Great app

author: Lindsey Grimes
comment: Love the app. Use it every day and it's great and always spot on for real time. The only thing I don't like is when looking up the timetable and keying in the time. It's not straight forward. Makes it very difficult and I end up having to search for times I don't want just to get it working
title: Time clock

author: Mike Guiney
comment: I like the newer interface. Being able to have a favourite station with north and southbound times quickly available is a great enhancement. But what is with the refresh? It's drawing over the last set of times which makes unreadable....
title: Screen refresh wonky on s5

author: G Ob
comment: Great for train finding. A pity somebody could not do similar for bus eireann. Their timetables are unreadable
title: Excellent app

author: A Google User
comment: Crash

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi, yes the app shows realtime information. Are you having difficulties? Feel free to email me on steemcb@gmail.com if you'd like some help.

title: Does this new version give real time info? I can't find it if it does.

author: Sirlyn Sandström
comment: I just  loved the previous app, but the new update on the app is so bad. No need to update when the app was already perfect before!

author: Muireann Tóibín
comment: Great app. My go-to to know whether to run for a DART or not!

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi there, the realtime data comes directly from Irish Rail's website so unfortunately I have no control over how reliable it is. If you find times are constantly incorrect you can email or tweet Irish Rail to let them know. There  are links on the app's info page for getting in contact with them. Thanks :)

title: Real time data not reliable

author: Amy Byrne
comment: It seems to be 3 minutes ahead of the actually time so train information disappears before the train has arrived...very frustrating
title: Problem with the time

author: Kasia Brzostowska
comment: Doesn't recognise clongriffin as station.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi there, sorry about that. Sounds like the app didn't download the list of stations properly when it first ran. If you either re-install the app or clear the app data it will grab a fresh list of stations which should include Clongriffin. You can email me on steemcb@gmail.com if it's still not showing up. Thanks!

title: Not all stations  listed

author: Qasem
comment: Thanks for the great app... would you please add an option to see bus routes on the map. Tnx
title: Working well...

author: Rory Hastings
comment: In my opinion it's more intuitive to use than the official irish rail app well done thanks
title: New update excellent

author: hula hooper
comment: Regularly doesn't show realtime train information since the upgrade...how come ?

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi, are you sure you're on the realtime screen and not the journey planner? Feel free to email me on steemcb@gmail.com if you'd like some help. Cheers.

author: Martin Kestell
comment: In app refresh button and definitive colour change on commuter/intercity status bar would make this a 5* app.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi, you can refresh by pulling down on the list of results. Not sure what you mean about status bar, feel free to email me on steemcb@gmail.com. Thanks

title: Could be great

author: Patrick Zajac
comment: Great work once again! Thank you!
title: Excellent

author: Enrico Mueller
comment: The new favourite station screen is now useless. It's now sorted after final destination first and after arriving time afterwards. No option to change the sorting order. If I just want to know when the next train arrives I have to scroll till the end

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi, I think when you left this review the Irish Rail realtime information was having some issues, trains should be correctly be ordered by arrival time now. Feel free to email me on steemcb@gmail.com if you're still having difficulties.

title: New look is nice, but ....

author: Tom Hanson
comment: Great app other than a couple of things.  I understand the reason for ads but full screen ads that show seconds after an activity is displayed (resulting in unwanted clicks) aren't great. There are better alternatives to full screen ads.   Also new material design change is a good step but makes interactions take longer.

author: A Google User
comment: Perfect app in general,  but the new layout isn't as good.  When you click on a particular reason,  it opens what is a lovely view of the rail line with each stop and time.  But this is cumbersome as you have to scroll down the line to see the stops. The old text version of each stop and arrival time was far simpler and easier to read.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi I've made some changes in the most recent update to show a train's last location as well as auto-scrolling down to the train's next arrival station. Hopefully that addresses your concerns regarding the redesign. Feel free to leave more feedback at steemcb@gmail.com. Thanks.

title: Newer version layout too clunky

author: A Google User
comment: A complete rewrite while travelling around the world. Pretty neat Stephen.
title: Does the job well

author: Denis Couto
comment: Now we're talking! You did a really good job here! Fast, reliable and beautiful.

author: Gordon Doherty
comment: This is a must for commuters. New version looks great.  Well done to the developer
title: Great app

author: A Google User
comment: Great app and lovely redesign

author: Nevan Bermingham
comment: Full screen ads are too intrusive and annoying. They ruin what was once a good app. The idea that I have to pay to get rid of full screen ads is ridiculous. Other free apps do a better job than this app.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi, thanks for the feedback. There is a premium version of the app available with ads removed and other exclusive features available to download here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextTrainIreland

title: Full screen ads ruin this app

author: Nick O'Neill
comment: Just missed the train cos of this app. Situation: My train in 8 mins showed as being 8 mind late. But it wasn't, it was perfectly on time. I was 4 mins late, 4 mins early for predicted time. After 7 mins of the 16 mins I thought I had It updated and said the train had left! Proving that this app is pointless and your just better off being on time every time!
title: Pointless

author: Sean O' Mahony
comment: Great app but the full screen ads are so intrusive that it can be difficult to find the information in a reasonable time. They also somehow open on top of each other
title: Ads

author: Juan Hernández
comment: Fast and sleek interface. Times are wrong for some trains which defeats the purpose (like the train I just missed because it)

author: Peter Watters
comment: For people complaining about ads why don't you fork out the cash to pay for it!
title: Great app

author: Davy Kennedy whelan
comment: Good, only bad thing is that I can only use it once then I have to uninstall it and then install it again
title: Train times

author: Stephen mcmanus
comment: No trains appear. Terrible ap
